lead_paragraph: Ronny Thompson, the younger son of the Hall of Fame coach John Thompson, resigned yesterday as basketball coach at Ball State, citing concerns about the university’s internal investigation into suspected violations of N.C.A.A. rules. Ball State was 9-22 last season. The university has said Thompson and his staff broke N.C.A.A. rules by attending voluntary off-season team workouts and lying about their involvement.
